ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def Load(form): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition registro = form.Entity if registro == None: return form.View.Commands["ASSUMIR"].Visible = (registro.Fields["RESPONSAVEL"].Handle.IsInvalid()) form.View.Commands["DEVOLVER"].Visible = (registro.Fields["RESPONSAVEL"].Handle.Equals(identity.UserHandle))
